mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ACADEMY_SOURCE ( ACADEMY_GU_ADDRESS, ACADEMY_TYPE, ACADEMY_NUMBER, ACADEMY_NAME, ACADEMY_ROAD_ADDRESS, ACADEMY_DONG_ADDRESS, ACADEMY_FIELD_NAME, ACADEMY_CURRICULUM_SERIES_NAME, ACADEMY_CURRICULUM_LIST_NAME, ACADEMY_CURRICULUM_NAME, ACADEMY_TOTAL_CAPACITY, ACADEMY_TOTAL_CAPACITY_PER_DAY, ACADEMY_TUITION_PER_PERSON, ACADEMY_TUITION_OPEN_STATUS, ACADEMY_DORMITORY_ACADEMY_STATUS, ACADEMY_ROAD_POSTAL_NUMBER, ACADEMY_REGISTER_STATUS_NAME, ACADEMY_REGISTER_DATE, ACADEMY_CLOSED_START_DATE, ACADEMY_CLOSED_END_DATE, ACADEMY_OPEN_DATE, ACADEMY_LOADING_DATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{academyGuAddress}, #{academyType}, #{academyNumber}, #{academyName}, #{academyRoadAddress}, #{academyDongAddress}, #{academyFieldName}, #{academyCurriculumSeriesName}, #{academyCurriculumListName}, #{academyCurriculumName}, #{academyTotalCapacity}, #{academyTotalCapacityPerDay}, #{academyTuitionPerPerson}, #{academyTuitionOpenStatus}, #{academyDormitoryAcademyStatus}, #{academyRoadPostalNumber}, #{academyRegisterStatusName}, #{academyRegisterDate}, #{academyClosedStartDate}, #{academyClosedEndDate}, #{academyOpenDate}, #{academyLoadingDateTime} )

INSERT INTO TB_ACADEMY_SOURCE ( ACADEMY_GU_ADDRESS, ACADEMY_TYPE, ACADEMY_NUMBER, ACADEMY_NAME, ACADEMY_ROAD_ADDRESS, ACADEMY_DONG_ADDRESS, ACADEMY_FIELD_NAME, ACADEMY_CURRICULUM_SERIES_NAME, ACADEMY_CURRICULUM_LIST_NAME, ACADEMY_CURRICULUM_NAME, ACADEMY_TOTAL_CAPACITY, ACADEMY_TOTAL_CAPACITY_PER_DAY, ACADEMY_TUITION_PER_PERSON, ACADEMY_TUITION_OPEN_STATUS, ACADEMY_DORMITORY_ACADEMY_STATUS, ACADEMY_ROAD_POSTAL_NUMBER, ACADEMY_REGISTER_STATUS_NAME, ACADEMY_REGISTER_DATE, ACADEMY_CLOSED_START_DATE, ACADEMY_CLOSED_END_DATE, ACADEMY_OPEN_DATE, ACADEMY_LOADING_DATE_TIME ) VALUES
( #{item.academyGuAddress}, #{item.academyType}, #{item.academyNumber}, #{item.academyName}, #{item.academyRoadAddress}, #{item.academyDongAddress}, #{item.academyFieldName}, #{item.academyCurriculumSeriesName}, #{item.academyCurriculumListName}, #{item.academyCurriculumName}, #{item.academyTotalCapacity}, #{item.academyTotalCapacityPerDay}, #{item.academyTuitionPerPerson}, #{item.academyTuitionOpenStatus}, #{item.academyDormitoryAcademyStatus}, #{item.academyRoadPostalNumber}, #{item.academyRegisterStatusName}, #{item.academyRegisterDate}, #{item.academyClosedStartDate}, #{item.academyClosedEndDate}, #{item.academyOpenDate}, #{item.academyLoadingDateTime} )
